metadata.name: American Poison
metadata.description:
It becomes impossible to remain in high spirits when you are surrounded by poison of the body, heart and mind. The Owl of wisdom sucks out human souls whilst it regurgitates a false colourful existence that exists through the sexually charged violence we watch on the Tell•Lie•Vision. Hypnotised into buying junk food that is pumped full of dangerous addictive chemicals yet we cannot resist that Happy Meal to make our children smile. It’s only the caffeine pumped heart that lifts our mood between prescribed medication to balance our emotions that have been shot to pieces by a barrage of fear with Space Monkeys, illegal wars & video games.

It will truly be the Mark of the Beast when we take the final bite of that poisonous Apple as our phones become implanted into our brains and we get trapped in the Matrix like Plato’s The Allegory of the Cave.
